meanings.definition: Of or relating to common people; plebeian
meanings.sent1: The plebby neighborhood was filled with friendly folks.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the plebby cafes over the fancy restaurants.
meanings.sent3: The plebby picnic turned into a fun community gathering.
meanings.sent4: His plebby taste in music surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The plebby clothing style was comfortable and practical.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of or resembling a pleb; uncultured or unsophisticated
meanings.sent1: The plebby behavior at the event was quite noticeable.
meanings.sent2: Her plebby manners made her stand out in the elegant crowd.
meanings.sent3: The plebby jokes he told always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The plebby artwork stood out among the sophisticated pieces.
meanings.sent5: His plebby taste in movies was evident from his collection.
